name: Grizzer_(massiff)
content: Grizzer was a massiff living on Coruscant during the Clone Wars between the Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems. The massiff's owner, clone Sergeant "Hound" was on patrol with Grizzer and other clone troopers of the Republic's Coruscant Guard at a military base on the planet Coruscant. Jedi Padawan Ahsoka Tano, incarcerated as a suspect in the Bombing of the Jedi Temple hangar and murder of Letta Turmond, was attempting to escape from the Republic military base. Grizzer was brought outside by its owner, ARF trooper "Hound," to search the area and track down Tano alongside other clone troopers. Grizzer picked up Tano's scent while she was hiding behind a statue. To evade Grizzer she climbed to the top of the statue, causing the animal to lose her scent.
